article.title: U.S. Air Force Awards Lockheed C-5 Infrared Countermeasures Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Marietta, Georgia, was awarded an $8 million contract modification to provide C-5 large aircraft infrared countermeasures Group A hardware and kit assembly. Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
